member.name: SHQUERYRBINFO
member.summary: Contains the size and item count information retrieved by the function.

member.name: SHQUERYRBINFO.cbSize
member.summary: The size of the structure, in bytes. This member must be filled in prior to calling the function.

member.name: SHQUERYRBINFO.i64Size
member.summary: The total size of all the objects in the specified Recycle Bin, in bytes.

member.name: SHQUERYRBINFO.i64NumItems
member.summary: The total number of items in the specified Recycle Bin.
